author: jukka
msg: JCR-2746: Sleep in possibly endless loop in ObservationDispatcher
Move the sleep to the end of SessionState.perform() after all the relevant locks have been released

author: felixk
msg: Fix some javadoc issues, mostly wrong formatting or wrong method parameter naming

author: jukka
msg: Restore the earlier revisions 995411 and 995412, and added the proposed patch that makes the lock re-entrant for related readers even after a write lock has been downgraded.
Documented this reentrancy requirement in ISMLocking javadocs and modified the DefaultISMLockingDeadlockTest case to check for this case.

author: jukka
msg: Add the ShareableNodeTest failures as known issues for JCR-RMI
